name: @axonstream/core
description: AxonStream Real-Time Collaboration Platform by axonstream.ai
author: axonstream.ai <info@axonstream.ai>

scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace=packages/sdk && npm run build --workspace=packages/react-hooks && npm run build --workspace=packages/cli
scripts.build:apps: npm run build --workspace=apps/api && npm run build --workspace=apps/web && npm run build --workspace=apps/docs
scripts.typecheck:all: npm run typecheck --workspace=packages/sdk && npm run typecheck --workspace=packages/react-hooks && npm run typecheck --workspace=packages/cli
scripts.publish:sdk: npm run build:sdk && cd packages/sdk && npm publish
scripts.pack:all: npm run build && npm run pack:packages
scripts.pack:packages: cd packages/sdk && npm pack --pack-destination ../../dist-tarballs && cd ../react-hooks && npm pack --pack-destination ../../dist-tarballs && cd ../cli && npm pack --pack-destination ../../dist-tarballs
scripts.publish:all: npm run pack:all && npm run publish:packages
scripts.publish:packages: cd packages/sdk && npm publish && cd ../react-hooks && npm publish && cd ../cli && npm publish
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run pack:all && npm run publish:packages
scripts.one-command: npm run release && echo 'ðŸŽ‰ AxonStream packages published successfully!'
